name: Joint Escape
description:
Two robbers try to escape a vault, but some weird curse links them together.

Use arrow keys and spacebar to help them.
Oh, and you have triple jump! Yay!

Made for TriJam #64 in just over 3 hours.
Since this is one of my first projects ever, i got stuck on some simple things and didn't have any time for graphics, sound or menus.

Have fun, share your hi-scores and any feedback is appreciated!
